title: Angie Martinez Interview and More
itunes:title: Angie Martinez Interview and More
description:
Monday 6/4 - Welp Drake has not responded to Pusha T yet, so does that mean that Pusha T wins? Well we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought. Also, we had Radio Royalty Angie Martinez stop by, where she discussed the Pusha T and Drake beef, work with Puerto Rico, her Radio Hall of Fame nomination and more. Also, after the antics of the new generation of rappers this weekend Charlamagne had to give "Donkey of the Day" to Rich the Kid after he ran away from Lil Uzi Vert for swinging on him, and then lying on the internet that nothing happened. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 6/4 - Welp Drake has not responded to Pusha T yet, so does that mean that Pusha T wins? Well we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought. Also, we had Radio Royalty Angie Martinez stop by, where she discussed the Pusha T and Drake beef, work with Puerto Rico, her Radio Hall of Fame nomination and more. Also, after the antics of the new generation of rappers this weekend Charlamagne had to give "Donkey of the Day" to Rich the Kid after he ran away from Lil Uzi Vert for swinging on him, and then lying on the internet that nothing happened.
